Going on vacation?

Book a room for your furry friend too!

CatSit makes travel easy by providing a luxurious hotel that cats can call home while their owners are away.

Features

Professional Team

Each of our catsitters are paired with at most 2 cats. Our team consists of:

  • 10 full-time catsitters
  • 1 on-site chef
  • 1 on-site groomer
  • 1 on-site vet

Gourmet Pet Food

Our on-site chefs prepare delicious, well-balanced meals according to your cat's dietary needs. You can also bring your own food.

Indoor/Outdoor Common Areas

Our indoor rooms are outfitted with cat shelves. Cats have a variety of CatSit-provided toys to play with in addition to the ones brought from home.

Our outdoor playspace is fully fenced. Cats are always supervised in the outdoor area.

Live Video Feed

Ever wonder what your cat does when you're not there? With regular and night-vision cameras in every room as well as an optional GoPro harness, you can see what your cats are up to at any time. GoPro videos are available for download at an extra cost.

Everyone deserves a good vacation. Cats do too! Book now!
